newsitem.title: SWITZERLAND: Yield on Swiss 3-month claims falls to 0.995 pct.
newsitem.headline: Yield on Swiss 3-month claims falls to 0.995 pct.

text.p: The average annual yield on the latest issue of Swiss federal government three-month money market claims fell to 0.995 percent from the previous issue's yield of 1.230 percent, the Swiss National Bank said.
Series 3.389 raised 741.25 million francs and was priced at 99.749 percent. Pay date is June 5.
An issue paid for on May 29 raised 779.25 million and was priced at 99.690 percent.
